name: The Wizard and the King
description:
Here is "The wizard and the King", my entry for the GBJam #8.

What is it about?

The Wizard and the King is an action-RPG game in which you play as a wizard.

You'll have to explore a castle in order to kill its evil king.

How to play?
  • Arrows : Moving.
  • O : Cast a small fireball.
  • P : Cast a powerful spell. You start the game with 2 of them, and will unlock more later in the game.
  • Control : Switch spell
  • Enter : Start the game
Credits

Code, Graphisms, Musics and sound effects by Marcan
